dialogue: May I borrow your headphones while you're at lunch?
I reject your request. I don't want cooties on my headphones.
Plus, you never return anything you borrow.
Why would you care if my ears touch something you will never see again?
Let's meet halfway. I'll return the headphones, but they will smell of me forever.
Then you might as well just keep them!
It doesn't feel like he met me halfway.
